ilex.fitting.fit_RMquad

fit_RMquad(Q, U, Qerr, Uerr, f, f0, **kwargs)[source]
Info:

Use Quadratic method to fit for RM and pa0.

Parameters:

  • Q (ndarray) – stokes Q or Q/I spectra

  • U (ndarray) – stokes U or U/I spectra

  • f (ndarray) – frequency array [MHz]

  • f0 (float) – reference frequency

  • **kwargs – kwargs for scipy.curve_fit()

Returns:

rotation measure rm_err (float): error in rotation measure pa0 (float): position angle at f0 pa0_err (float): error in position angle at f0

Return type:

rm (float)
